alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:00PM CDT until April 09 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... White River at Edwardsport, Hazleton, and Petersburg. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site, Riverton, and Mount Carmel. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the Wabash and White Rivers. With dry weather expected for at least several days, the existing flooding is expected to end over the weekend for most locations, but continue until Tuesday next week at Mount Carmel, and near the end of next week at Hazleton. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Some agricultural lands underwater. A few rural roads in Crawford County, Illinois close as water backs up Minnow Slough. High water affects campground at Leaverton Park in Palestine. A few private roads near the Gill Township levee in Sullivan County may flood. Water level is at the top of most makeshift levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ the stage was 16.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 7.1 feet Monday, April 17. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
